quote.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quote.author: Steve Jobs

quote.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quote.author: Winston Churchill

quote.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quote.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quote.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quote.author: Confucius

quote.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quote.author: George Addair

quote.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quote.author: Thomas Edison

quote.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quote.author: Tony Robbins

quote.text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quote.author: William James

quote.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quote.author: Henry David Thoreau

quote.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quote.author: Sam Levenson
quote.context: You Don't Have to Be in Who's Who to Know What's What

quote.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quote.author: Walt Disney

quote.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quote.author: John D. Rockefeller

quote.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quote.author: Thomas Jefferson

quote.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quote.author: Colin R. Davis

quote.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quote.author: Will Rogers

quote.text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you.
quote.author: Unknown

quote.text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quote.author: Vince Lombardi

quote.text: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed.
quote.author: Steve Jobs

quote.text: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quote.author: Rob Siltanen

quote.text: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quote.author: Og Mandino
quote.context: The Greatest Salesman in the World

quote.text: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
quote.author: Maya Angelou

quote.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Wishing is not enough; we must do.
quote.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote.text: Imagine your life is perfect in every respect; what would it look like?
quote.author: Brian Tracy
quote.context: Goals! How to Get Everything You Want

quote.text: We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.
quote.author: Dr. Henry Link

quote.text: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you're right.
quote.author: Henry Ford

quote.text: Security is mostly a superstition. Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
quote.author: Helen Keller

quote.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quote.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote.text: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quote.author: Albert Einstein

quote.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quote.author: Zig Ziglar
quote.context: See You at the Top book

quote.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quote.author: C.S. Lewis

quote.text: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
quote.author: Winston Churchill

quote.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quote.author: Roy T. Bennett
quote.context: The Light in the Heart book

quote.text: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quote.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote.text: It's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quote.author: Abraham Lincoln

quote.text: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quote.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quote.author: Chinese Proverb

quote.text: Only the educated are free.
quote.author: Epictetus

quote.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quote.author: Mark Twain

quote.text: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
quote.author: Estée Lauder

quote.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quote.author: William Butler Yeats
quote.context: The Wind Among the Reeds poetry

quote.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quote.author: Booker T. Washington

quote.text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quote.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote.text: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.
quote.author: Mother Teresa

quote.text: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quote.author: Milton Berle

quote.text: You can't fall if you don't climb. But there's no joy in living your whole life on the ground.
quote.author: Unknown

quote.text: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quote.author: Joshua J. Marine

quote.text: If you want to achieve excellence, you can get there today. Stop doing less-than-excellent work.
quote.author: Thomas J. Watson

quote.text: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quote.author: Karen Lamb

quote.text: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
quote.author: Michael Jordan

quote.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quote.author: Winston Churchill

quote.text: The distance between your dreams and reality is called action.
quote.author: Unknown

quote.text: Stop being afraid of what could go wrong and start being excited about what could go right.
quote.author: Tony Robbins

quote.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quote.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quote.author: Arthur Ashe

quote.text: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quote.author: Muhammad Ali
